nodes.text: The Clone Wars: The Dark Side

The Clone Wars: The Dark Side is a children's activity and glow-in-the-dark sticker book that ties into Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It was published in paperback format in the UK on February 2, 2009. It was also published as a sticker book only, minus the activity part, in hardback format.
For the youngest Star Wars: The Clone Wars fans, this activity book includes games, puzzles, mazes, and two glow-in-the-dark sticker pages.
